• Prepare the field to get a fine tilth. • Chisel the soils with hard pan • Spread 12.5 t of FYM or compost or 2.5 t of vermicompost per ha if available, uniformly on the unploughed soilield
FORMATION OF RIDGES AND FURROWS
Form ridges and furrows 10 m long with appropriate spacing depending upon the variety. Use ridge plough or bund former to form ridges so as to economise on cost of cultivation.
